sentences.sentence: The mechanism of organic acids on an anion exchange column Shim pack (Shimadzu, Japan) have been studied.
sentences.translation: 研究了有机酸在阴离子交换柱垫片组（日本岛津）上的作用机制。

sentences.sentence: Andrew Shim is twenty-two years old, from Maryland.
sentences.translation: 22岁的安德鲁·希姆来自马里兰州。

sentences.sentence: Andrew Shim and Jack Feldman are doing collegeinternship programs in Washington.
sentences.translation: 安德鲁·希姆和杰克·菲德曼一起在华盛顿实习。
